item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description:
Ya, I liked that part too. I guess if they put out the same quantity of content as say an EQ at a Blizzard pace (the company, not the weather system), then I could see 20, even 30 years.
ZING!
item.content:encoded:
Ya, I liked that part too. I guess if they put out the same quantity of content as say an EQ at a Blizzard pace (the company, not the weather system), then I could see 20, even 30 years.

ZING!

item.title: By: Ninefingers
item.dc:creator: Ninefingers
item.content:encoded:
Didn’t you all love the quote that said something along the lines of: “World of Warcraft has so much to give. I can see us expanding the game for 5, 10, even 20 years from now!”

Riiiiiight.

Ninefingers

item.title: By: Byron Ellacott
item.dc:creator: Byron Ellacott
item.description: Meh, didn't address whether the xpack's content will be tuned for people in AQ/Nax gear, or people in "Dungeon 2: The Bone Throwing" gear. That's a pretty critical point, IMO, and the biggest problem with the gear gap, since I don't PvP.
item.content:encoded: Meh, didn’t address whether the xpack’s content will be tuned for people in AQ/Nax gear, or people in “Dungeon 2: The Bone Throwing” gear. That’s a pretty critical point, IMO, and the biggest problem with the gear gap, since I don’t PvP.
